idea-plugin.name: FluentValidation
idea-plugin.description:
Support plugin for FluentValidation. A validation library for .NET that uses a fluent interface to construct strongly-typed validation rules.

  • Custom validators via validator and rule live templates
  • Reusable property validators via property_validator and rule_builder live templates
  • Validator icon in completion and navigation
  • Code inspections for mismatched async/sync calls
  • Postfix template .validate
